com.bigdata.bop.join

Class BaseJoinStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.bop.engine.BOpStats
      • com.bigdata.bop.join.BaseJoinStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PipelineJoinStats

    public class BaseJoinStats
extends BOpStats
    Extended to expose counters shared by various join operators (some join operators may define more counters as well).
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • accessPathDups

        public final CAT accessPathDups
        The #of duplicate access paths which were detected and filtered out. This will be ZERO (0L) unless the join operator can coalesce access paths.

      • accessPathCount

        public final CAT accessPathCount
        The #of access paths which were evaluated. Each access path corresponds to one or more input binding sets having the same binding pattern for the variables appearing in the access path.

        Note: Some join operators can coalesce duplicate access paths. Such operators may reported fewer access paths here.

        Note: Hash join operators typically run the access path exactly once (if they are written to use the native heap and their memory budget is exceeded then they may run the access path more than once).

      • accessPathRangeCount

        public final CAT accessPathRangeCount
        The running sum of the range counts of the accepted as-bound access paths.

      • accessPathChunksIn

        public final CAT accessPathChunksIn
        The #of chunks read from an IAccessPath.

      • accessPathUnitsIn

        public final CAT accessPathUnitsIn
        The #of elements read from an IAccessPath.
